p: The essential oils were extracted by hydrodistillation using Clevenger system. A quantity of 100g of dry leaves diluted in water at a ratio of 1:10 was boiled at 100Â°C for 3 hours. The oil was dried over anhydrous sodium sulfate and kept in an amber bottle under refrigeration [ 13]. For in vitro biological assay, the essential oils were dissolved in dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) at 100 times the highest concentration of use and subsequently diluted in an appropriate medium to a final concentration of less than 1% of DMSO.
